item.title: Imagemagick examples
item.author: blazeva1 -a- fit.cvut.cz <Václav Blažej> (Václav Blažej)
item.description: The imagemagick’s magick (convert) program provides a great command line tool for editing images. Doing a simple bulk edition can be frustrating as there are many unuseful resources for this program. I made this page to keep examples of most useful commands I needed, found, and used. It is written in a way so that when read sequentially you should get a reasonable idea how to use this tool. ➤ Running bulk commands To be able to do bulk edition a basic bash knowledge is expected.
